html:
11.3.21  12:47 pm   Do any of your songs have meanings behind them?

      every one of them has as much meaning as possible, all through it

11.3.21  9:59 am   What common object right now do you think will be a really valuable antique 100 years from now?

      penny

11.3.21  9:56 am   is the two week schedule working out as expected so far since you've released more than a dream?

      i didn't have any strong expectations about it. it's almost impossible

11.3.21  7:05 am   Not sure if anyone asked this before but how do you write good melodies for your songs?

      sometimes i just write a bad one and pretend it's good

11.3.21  4:24 am   Are trees the bees knees?

      better yet, bees are the trees knees

11.3.21  12:35 am   do you enjoy poetry?

      yes, but that's because everything is poetry

11.3.21  12:16 am   do you ever cry?

      i barely ever stop

11.2.21  11:09 pm   What was your favorite year?

      how about next year

11.2.21  10:15 pm   what did Damien skip on his list?

      another list

11.2.21  5:12 pm   do you believe in negative emotions?

if you do, when you have a negative emotion, what do you do with it? do you try to "let go of it" or feel it more presently to understand it and/or let it transform into something else and/or have it let go of you. i feel horrible for asking a question and giving 3 options but i felt like it was required to give enough context of my predicament. its almost like meditation vs awareness. from the side of meditation that tries to tell you to get your mind "blank". it seems like awareness is simply not having thoughts about what is there. 

      the funny thing, about the ups and downs, is you're gonna have to answer this differently every time. i could try to give you a permanent answer, but that would only set you up for a crash eventually

11.2.21  4:57 pm   im trying to learn a song on an instrument. the song is in 8/11. I am having a hard time tapping my foot to or counting the beat, how do i feel 8/11 better

      i've never heard of an 8/11 time signature

11.2.21  4:19 pm   Do you have any tips in regards to exploring new crazy and wacky chords out there that sound good?

      yes. here's the best trick i can think of: the more you think about the whole situation, the better the chords get. figure out the whole reason for the song's existence. if it's in a movie, think about the whole story. if the song is in a restaurant, think about the restaurant and the location of the restaurant and everything about it. if the song is on a train, think about where the train goes. if the song is in your real life, think about your real life. that's where you'll find where all the deepest chords seem to mean everything. However, if you focus on just the chords, you'll find, bizarrely, none of them seem to feel like anything

11.2.21  3:22 pm   what is your opinion on brand loyalty

      it all depends which brand. i like loyalty to good brands. loyalty to bad brands, however, would be not so good

11.2.21  1:16 pm   do you sometimes think of how people perceive you (as an artist) and your work ?

     no, that's because at any given time, no one has yet perceived whatever work i'm currently working on. even the stuff that has been released, was made at a time when no one else had perceived it yet

      i see you as some kind of hyper dimensional being. is that right ?

     same amount as you

11.2.21  12:30 pm   hi bill, I just thought about the line "slept through every season, I just dreamed the seasons". does it refer to the seasons of the year, or other meanings of season, such as some period of time (game season for example), or seasons of a tv show?

     the line itself is music. i was engaging in a bit of music-writing, which i suppose is similar to witchcraft, but less evil

     did you also mean to suggest that everything we experience is a dream and that nothing really exists the way we see it, but that our minds interpret the world to make us experience as we do?

     basically i was on the way into re-hab for using the word 'dream' too much in most of my previous songs. but then i slipped and relapsed x100. as a result, it seems, the song turned out to be a celebration of everything dreams can be

     if you didn't mean to have any of these, do they at least sound plausible to you? 

      sort of

11.2.21  12:09 pm   why is the sun so bright?

      how bright do you think it should be

11.2.21  11:11 am   how are we alive if the earth is spinning wouldn't we get FLUNG off

      that's one of the great mysteries of life

11.2.21  9:47 am   are spiders good

      everything is good

11.2.21  8:28 am   Do you mind explaining your reasoning for the answer to a question asked recently about having five turtles, and then taking two away, but then ending up with two?

      yes. you took 2. that's how many you have now. if you go back and look at how the question was phrased, i think you'll see that's the intended answer

11.2.21  4:37 am   Is the ocean soup?

      it's more of a cereal

11.1.21  11:54 pm   is music real

      too real. broke the realness index

11.1.21  11:49 pm   how come everything is automatically beautiful

      in case someone forgets to do the work

11.1.21  10:42 pm   how do you get back in your mind, i've been out of mine for a while now

      get into the world

11.1.21  9:51 pm   do you like existing?

      yes but it's a real mind fuck

11.1.21  6:55 pm   am i here

      yes, that is a perfect description of you

11.1.21  6:54 pm   What's your favourite story?

      time

11.1.21  5:40 pm   Is Cereal Soup?

      it's a sandwich

11.1.21  5:27 pm   Hey, Bill what is your favorite song that you made?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

     I think my favorite is either Slow Down or And the day goes on.

11.1.21  4:03 pm   what can i teach a seven year old ?

      how about the '-tion' suffix, and how to pronounce and spell it

11.1.21  3:05 pm   do you like living in the moment?

      i like living all the time

11.1.21  1:56 pm   Do you have any tips in regards to exploring new crazy and wacky chords out there?

      it depends if you want them to sound good

11.1.21  1:49 pm   Your music is nice, how do you make music?

      sometimes a little reverse psychology is all it takes

11.1.21  1:20 pm   would you describe yourself as "crazy"?

      maybe, to fit in

11.1.21  1:18 pm   If you had 5 turtles but then took away 2 turtles how many turtles would you have?

      2

11.1.21  12:13 pm   Is "I'm a princess" based on the Syrian civil war?

     no

     I noticed that many of the lyrics matched up with the experiences of Doaa al Zamel and her family.

11.1.21  11:57 am   What is the biggest planet in the world

      jupiter

11.1.21  11:08 am   So although you don't have a favorite song you've made, do you think you improve with each song, as if each song of yours is better than the last?

      that's what i'm supposed to do

11.1.21  10:56 am   Do you wanna build a snowman?

      how about a snow woman

11.1.21  10:53 am   What was your Halloween costume

      i've never had a halloween costume

11.1.21  10:51 am   are u working on a book

      no

11.1.21  10:51 am   do you enjoy stand-up comedy?

      sometimes

11.1.21  10:22 am   what helps you with ideas for songs

      seeing the whole world

11.1.21  9:11 am   what does it mean when people say "the middle 8"

      i think they are probably talking about the "B" section of a song with form "A A B A". to put it in terms of farm equipment, let's say you have a series of farm vehicles: 2 tractors, then 1 snowmobile, then 1 more tractor. "the middle 8" would refer to the snowmobile

11.1.21  9:22 am   so a dominant seventh is a minor seventh on top of a major triad. is a recessive seventh a major seventh on top of a minor triad? 

      i've never heard of a recessive seventh

11.1.21  8:50 am   Have you read the hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy?

      no

11.1.21  9:25 am   why do i like your songs?

      i must have somehow been able to *influence* you

11.1.21  8:26 am   What's your favorite knock-knock joke?

      knocking on the door from the inside just as the person arrives

11.1.21  8:08 am   thoughts on conciousness?

      can't believe it

11.1.21  8:43 am   how to cope with one's mediocrity when surrounded by excellence

      just cope with your excellence instead

11.1.21  6:08 am   do you like comic books?

      i like the production pace they can achieve
